resources.string:
-> jitsi-meet-sdk for video call 

-> Firebase for authentication ,chat , notification and post 

-> kotlin for creating app 

->Material Design for interface

-> Android Documentation from Google 

 -> Firebase Documentation 

 -> Stack Overflow (🙏 🙏 🙏) 

 -> Youtube for specific section 

 -> GFG Documentation

Create a unique room id, ask your friends 
 to join the same room through that Id 
and enjoy video call with your 
friends and family
